title: The Essential Rosa Luxemburg: Reform or Revolution / The Mass Strike
description: This new, authoritative introduction to Rosa Luxemburgâ€™s two most important works presents the full text of Reform or Revolution and The Mass Strike, with explanatory notes, appendices, and introductions.One of the most important Marxist thinkers and leaders of the twentieth century, Rosa Luxemburg is finding renewed interest among a new generation of activists and critics of global capitalism.
author: Rosa Luxemburg
